content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: TAETORD
      operator: is_not_unique_set
      value:
        - ARM
Core:
  Id: CORE-000144
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Trigger error when TAETORD is not unique within an ARM
Outcome:
  Message: TAETORD is not unique within ARM
  Output Variables:
    - TAETORD
    - ARM
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0247
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Number that gives the order of the Element within
                  the Arm.
                Document: IG v3.4
                Item: Specification
                Section: 7.2.1
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - TRIAL DESIGN
  Domains:
    Include:
      - TA

json.Description: Trigger error when TAETORD is not unique within an ARM

Outcome.Message: TAETORD is not unique within ARM

Citations.Cited_Guidance: Number that gives the order of the Element within the Arm.
